title: S4 Ep14: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 7 – A Hopeless Cluster
itunes:title: State v. Greg Lance – Addendum 7 – A Hopeless Cluster
description:
October 24, 2019 / Rebecca, Rabia and Susan discuss the 18 month period between Greg’s arrest and trial, including strategic decisions that may have ended up backfiring.
 
Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s addendum has been sponsored by SimpliSafe and Boll and Branch.
